attributes.action: Ban the use of the phrase 'thats really got my goat'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is without doubt, one of the stupidest phrases ever introduced into the English language, it achieves nothing, is terribly silly, and no one ever likes to use it.

It came from the use of putting goats in with racehorses to calm them down before a race; when they took the goat away, and if the horse became agitated then the phrase would be used.

Be honest, no one uses it, no one respects it, and no one wants to see it as part of the English language

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
